3427 //---------------------------------------------------------
3428 // keyboard nav constants
3429 //---------------------------------------------------------
3430 
3431 constexpr qreal scrollStep { .8 };
3432 constexpr qreal thinPadding { 10.0 };
3433 constexpr qreal thickPadding { 25.0 };
3434 
3435 //---------------------------------------------------------
3436 // pageNext
3437 //---------------------------------------------------------
3438 
3439 void ScoreView::pageNext()
3440  {
3441  if (score()->pages().empty())
3442  return;
3443  if (score()->layoutMode() != LayoutMode::PAGE) {
3444  screenNext();
3445  return;
3446  }
3447  Page* page = score()->pages().back();
3448  qreal x, y;
3449  if (MScore::verticalOrientation()) {
3450  x = thinPadding;
3451  y = yoffset() - (page->height() + thickPadding) * physicalZoomLevel();
3452  qreal ly = thinPadding - page->pos().y() * physicalZoomLevel();
3453  if (y <= ly - height() * scrollStep) {
3454  pageEnd();
3455  return;
3456  }
3457  }
3458  else {
3459  y = thinPadding;
3460  x = xoffset() - (page->width() + thickPadding) * physicalZoomLevel();
3461  qreal lx = thinPadding - page->pos().x() * physicalZoomLevel();
3462  if (x <= lx - width() * scrollStep) {
3463  pageEnd();
3464  return;
3465  }
3466  }
3467  setOffset(x, y);
3468  update();
3469  }
3470 
3471 //---------------------------------------------------------
3472 // screenNext
3473 //---------------------------------------------------------
3474 
3475 void ScoreView::screenNext()
3476  {
3477  if (score()->pages().empty())
3478  return;
3479  qreal x { xoffset() };
3480  qreal y { yoffset() };
3481  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::LINE) {
3482  x -= width() * scrollStep;
3483  MeasureBase* lm = score()->lastMeasureMM();
3484  // Vertical frames aren't laid out in continuous view
3485  while (lm->isVBoxBase())
3486  lm = lm->prev();
3487  qreal lx = (lm->pos().x() + lm->width()) * physicalZoomLevel() - width() * scrollStep;
3488  if (x < -lx)
3489  x = -lx;
3490  }
3491  else {
3492  y -= height() * scrollStep;
3493  MeasureBase* lm { score()->lastMeasureMM() };
3494  qreal ly { (lm->canvasPos().y() + lm->height()) * physicalZoomLevel() - height() * scrollStep };
3495  // Special case to jump to top of next page in horizontal view.
3496  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::PAGE && !MScore::verticalOrientation()
3497  && y <= -ly - height() * scrollStep) {
3498  pageNext();
3499  return;
3500  }
3501  if (y < -ly)
3502  y = -ly;
3503  }
3504  setOffset(x, y);
3505  update();
3506  }
3507 
3508 //---------------------------------------------------------
3509 // pagePrev
3510 //---------------------------------------------------------
3511 
3512 void ScoreView::pagePrev()
3513  {
3514  if (score()->pages().empty())
3515  return;
3516  if (score()->layoutMode() != LayoutMode::PAGE) {
3517  screenPrev();
3518  return;
3519  }
3520  Page* page = score()->pages().front();
3521  qreal x, y;
3522  if (MScore::verticalOrientation()) {
3523  x = thinPadding;
3524  y = yoffset() + (page->height() + thickPadding) * physicalZoomLevel();
3525  if (y > thinPadding)
3526  y = thinPadding;
3527  }
3528  else {
3529  y = thinPadding;
3530  x = xoffset() + (page->width() + thickPadding) * physicalZoomLevel();
3531  if (x > thinPadding)
3532  x = thinPadding;
3533  }
3534  setOffset(x, y);
3535  update();
3536  }
3537 
3538 //---------------------------------------------------------
3539 // screenPrev
3540 //---------------------------------------------------------
3541 
3542 void ScoreView::screenPrev()
3543  {
3544  if (score()->pages().empty())
3545  return;
3546  qreal x { xoffset() };
3547  qreal y { yoffset() };
3548  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::LINE) {
3549  x += width() * scrollStep;
3550  if (x > thinPadding)
3551  x = thinPadding;
3552  }
3553  else {
3554  y += height() * scrollStep;
3555  // Special casing for jumping to bottom of prev page in horizontal view
3556  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::PAGE && !MScore::verticalOrientation()
3557  && y >= thinPadding + height() * scrollStep) {
3558  Page* page { score()->pages().front() };
3559  x += (page->width() + thickPadding) * physicalZoomLevel();
3560  // The condition prevents jumping to the bottom of the
3561  // first page after reaching the top
3562  if (x < thinPadding + (page->width() + thickPadding) * physicalZoomLevel()) {
3563  MeasureBase* lm { score()->lastMeasureMM() };
3564  y = -(lm->canvasPos().y() + lm->height()) * physicalZoomLevel() + height() * scrollStep;
3565  }
3566  if (x > thinPadding)
3567  x = thinPadding;
3568  }
3569  if (y > thinPadding)
3570  y = thinPadding;
3571  }
3572  setOffset(x, y);
3573  update();
3574  }
3575 
3576 //---------------------------------------------------------
3577 // pageTop
3578 //---------------------------------------------------------
3579 
3580 void ScoreView::pageTop()
3581  {
3582  switch (score()->layoutMode()) {
3583  case LayoutMode::PAGE:
3584  {
3585  qreal dx = thinPadding, dy = thinPadding;
3586  Page* firstPage = score()->pages().front();
3587  Page* lastPage = score()->pages().back();
3588  if (firstPage && lastPage) {
3589  QPointF offsetPt(xoffset(), yoffset());
3590  QRectF firstPageRect(firstPage->pos().x() * physicalZoomLevel(),
3591  firstPage->pos().y() * physicalZoomLevel(),
3592  firstPage->width() * physicalZoomLevel(),
3593  firstPage->height() * physicalZoomLevel());
3594  QRectF lastPageRect(lastPage->pos().x() * physicalZoomLevel(),
3595  lastPage->pos().y() * physicalZoomLevel(),
3596  lastPage->width() * physicalZoomLevel(),
3597  lastPage->height() * physicalZoomLevel());
3598  QRectF pagesRect = firstPageRect.united(lastPageRect);
3599  dx = qMax(thinPadding, (width() - pagesRect.width()) / 2);
3600  dy = qMax(thinPadding, (height() - pagesRect.height()) / 2);
3601  }
3602  setOffset(dx, dy);
3603  break;
3604  }
3605  case LayoutMode::LINE:
3606  setOffset(thinPadding, 0.0);
3607  break;
3608  case LayoutMode::SYSTEM:
3609  {
3610  qreal dx = thinPadding, dy = thinPadding;
3611  Page* page = score()->pages().front();
3612  if (page) {
3613  dx = qMax(thinPadding, (width() - page->width() * physicalZoomLevel()) / 2);
3614  }
3615  setOffset(dx, dy);
3616  break;
3617  }
3618  default:
3619  setOffset(thinPadding, thinPadding);
3620  break;
3621  }
3622  update();
3623  }
3624 
3625 //---------------------------------------------------------
3626 // pageEnd
3627 //---------------------------------------------------------
3628 
3629 void ScoreView::pageEnd()
3630  {
3631  if (score()->pages().empty())
3632  return;
3633  MeasureBase* lm = score()->lastMeasureMM();
3634  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::LINE) {
3635  // Vertical frames aren't laid out in continuous view
3636  while (lm->isVBoxBase())
3637  lm = lm->prev();
3638  qreal lx = (lm->pos().x() + lm->width()) * physicalZoomLevel() - scrollStep * width();
3639  setOffset(-lx, yoffset());
3640  }
3641  else {
3642  qreal lx { -thinPadding };
3643  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::PAGE && !MScore::verticalOrientation()) {
3644  for (int i { 0 }; i < score()->npages() - 1; ++i)
3645  lx += score()->pages().at(i)->width() * physicalZoomLevel();
3646  }
3647  if (lm->system() && lm->system()->page()->width() * physicalZoomLevel() > width())
3648  lx = (lm->canvasPos().x() + lm->width()) * physicalZoomLevel() - width() * scrollStep;
3649 
3650  qreal ly { (lm->canvasPos().y() + lm->height()) * physicalZoomLevel() - height() * scrollStep };
3651  setOffset(-lx, -ly);
3652  }
3653  update();
3654  }

3656 //---------------------------------------------------------
3657 // adjustCanvasPosition
3658 //---------------------------------------------------------
3659 
3660 void ScoreView::adjustCanvasPosition(const Element* el, bool playBack, int staff )
3661  {
3662  if (this != mscore->currentScoreView() && !_moveWhenInactive)
3663  return;
3664  // TODO: change icon, or add panning options
3665  if (!mscore->panDuringPlayback())
3666  return;
3667 
3668  if (score()->layoutMode() == LayoutMode::LINE) {
3669 
3670  if (!el)
3671  return;
3672 
3673  /* Not used, because impossible to get panel width beforehand
3674  const MeasureBase* m = 0;
3675  if (el->type() == ElementType::MEASURE)
3676  m = static_cast<const MeasureBase*>(el);
3677  else
3678  m = static_cast<const Measure*>(el->parent()->findMeasure());
3679  */
3680 
3681  qreal xo = 0.0; // new x offset
3682  QRectF curPos = playBack ? _cursor->rect() : el->canvasBoundingRect();
3683  if (playBack && _cursor && seq->isPlaying() && panSettings().enabled)
3684  curPos = _controlCursor->rect();
3685  // keep current note in view as well if applicable (note input mode)
3686  Element* current = nullptr;
3687  if (noteEntryMode()) {
3688  current = score()->selection().cr();
3689  if (current && current != el)
3690  curPos |= current->canvasBoundingRect();
3691  }
3692 
3693  qreal curPosR = curPos.right(); // Position on the canvas
3694  qreal curPosL = curPos.left(); // Position on the canvas
3695  qreal curPosScrR = curPosR * physicalZoomLevel() + xoffset(); // Position in the screen
3696  qreal curPosScrL = curPosL * physicalZoomLevel() + xoffset(); // Position in the screen
3697  qreal marginLeft = width() * 0.05;
3698  qreal marginRight = width() * 0.05; // leaves 5% margin to the right
3699 
3700 // if (_continuousPanel->active()) causes jump
3701 // marginLeft += _continuousPanel->width() * physicalZoomLevel();
3702 
3703  // this code implements "continuous" panning
3704  // it could potentially be enabled via more panning options
3705  if (playBack && _cursor && seq->isPlaying() && preferences.getBool(PREF_PAN_SMOOTHLY_ENABLED)) {
3706  // keep playback cursor pinned at 35% (or at the percent of controlCursorScreenPos + 5%)
3707  xo = -curPosL * physicalZoomLevel() + marginLeft + width() * _panSettings.controlCursorScreenPos;
3708  }
3709  else if (round(curPosScrR) > round(width() - marginRight)) {
3710  // focus in or beyond right margin
3711  // pan to left margin in playback,
3712  // most of the way left in note entry,
3713  // otherwise just enforce right margin
3714  if (playBack)
3715  xo = -curPosL * physicalZoomLevel() + marginLeft;
3716  else if (noteEntryMode())
3717  xo = -curPosL * physicalZoomLevel() + marginLeft + width() * 0.2;
3718  else
3719  xo = -curPosR * physicalZoomLevel() + width() - marginRight;
3720  }
3721  else if (round(curPosScrL) < round(marginLeft) ) {
3722  // focus in or beyond left margin
3723  // enforce left margin
3724  // (previously we moved canvas all the way right,
3725  // but this made sense only when navigating right-to-left)
3726  xo = -curPosL * physicalZoomLevel() + marginLeft;
3727  }
3728  else {
3729  // focus is within margins, so do nothing
3730  return;
3731  }
3732  // avoid empty space on either side of "page"
3733  qreal scoreEnd = score()->pages().front()->width() * physicalZoomLevel() + xo;
3734  if (xo > 10)
3735  xo = 10;
3736  else if (scoreEnd < width())
3737  xo += width() - scoreEnd;
3738 
3739  setOffset(xo, yoffset());
3740  update();
3741  return;
3742  }
3743 
3744  const MeasureBase* m;
3745  if (!el)
3746  return;
3747  else if (el->type() == ElementType::NOTE)
3748  m = static_cast<const Note*>(el)->chord()->measure();
3749  else if (el->type() == ElementType::REST)
3750  m = static_cast<const Rest*>(el)->measure();
3751  else if (el->type() == ElementType::CHORD)
3752  m = static_cast<const Chord*>(el)->measure();
3753  else if (el->type() == ElementType::SEGMENT)
3754  m = static_cast<const Segment*>(el)->measure();
3755  else if (el->type() == ElementType::LYRICS)
3756  m = static_cast<const Lyrics*>(el)->measure();
3757  else if ( (el->type() == ElementType::HARMONY || el->type() == ElementType::FIGURED_BASS)
3758  && el->parent()->type() == ElementType::SEGMENT)
3759  m = static_cast<const Segment*>(el->parent())->measure();
3760  else if (el->type() == ElementType::HARMONY && el->parent()->type() == ElementType::FRET_DIAGRAM
3761  && el->parent()->parent()->type() == ElementType::SEGMENT)
3762  m = static_cast<const Segment*>(el->parent()->parent())->measure();
3763  else if (el->isMeasureBase())
3764  m = static_cast<const MeasureBase*>(el);
3765  else if (el->isSpannerSegment()) {
3766  Element* se = static_cast<const SpannerSegment*>(el)->spanner()->startElement();
3767  m = static_cast<Measure*>(se->findMeasure());
3768  }
3769  else if (el->isSpanner()) {
3770  Element* se = static_cast<const Spanner*>(el)->startElement();
3771  m = static_cast<Measure*>(se->findMeasure());
3772  }
3773  else {
3774  // attempt to find measure
3775  Element* e = el->parent();
3776  while (e && !e->isMeasureBase())
3777  e = e->parent();
3778  if (e)
3779  m = toMeasureBase(e);
3780  else
3781  return;
3782  }
3783  if (!m)
3784  return;
3785 
3786  int staffIdx = el->staffIdx();
3787  System* sys = m->system();
3788  if (!sys)
3789  return;
3790 
3791  QPointF p(el->canvasPos());
3792  QRectF r(canvasViewport());
3793  QRectF mRect(m->canvasBoundingRect());
3794  QRectF sysRect;
3795  if (staffIdx == -1)
3796  sysRect = sys->canvasBoundingRect();
3797  else
3798  sysRect = sys->staff(staffIdx)->bbox();
3799 
3800  // only try to track measure if not during playback
3801  if (!playBack)
3802  sysRect = mRect;
3803 
3804  double _spatium = score()->spatium();
3805  const qreal border = _spatium * 3;
3806  QRectF showRect;
3807  if (staff == -1) {
3808  showRect = QRectF(mRect.x(), sysRect.y(), mRect.width(), sysRect.height())
3809  .adjusted(-border, -border, border, border);
3810  }
3811  else {
3812  // find a box for the individual stave in a system
3813  QRectF stave = QRectF(sys->canvasBoundingRect().left(),
3814  sys->staffCanvasYpage(staff),
3815  sys->width(),
3816  sys->staff(staff)->bbox().height());
3817  showRect = mRect.intersected(stave).adjusted(-border, -border, border, border);
3818  }
3819 
3820 /*printf("%f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %d\n",
3821  showRect.x(), showRect.y(), showRect.width(), showRect.height(),
3822  r.x(), r.y(), r.width(), r.height(),
3823  r.contains(showRect)
3824  );
3825 */
3826  // canvas is not as wide as measure, track note instead
3827  if (r.width() < showRect.width()) {
3828  QRectF eRect(el->canvasBoundingRect());
3829  showRect.setX(eRect.x());
3830  showRect.setWidth(eRect.width());
3831  }
3832 
3833  // canvas is not as tall as system
3834  if (r.height() < showRect.height()) {
3835  if (sys->staves()->size() == 1 || !playBack) {
3836  // track note if single staff
3837  showRect.setY(p.y());
3838  showRect.setHeight(el->height());
3839  }
3840  else if (sys->page()->systems().size() == 1) {
3841  // otherwise, just keep current vertical position if possible
3842  // see issue #7724
3843  showRect.setY(r.y());
3844  showRect.setHeight(r.height());
3845  }
3846  }
3847  if (shadowNote->visible())
3848  setShadowNote(p);
3849 
3850  if (r.contains(showRect))
3851  return;
3852 
3853  qreal x = - xoffset() / physicalZoomLevel();
3854  qreal y = - yoffset() / physicalZoomLevel();
3855 
3856  qreal oldX = x, oldY = y;
3857 
3858  if (showRect.left() < r.left())
3859  x = showRect.left() - border;
3860  else if (showRect.left() > r.right())
3861  x = showRect.right() - width() / physicalZoomLevel() + border;
3862  else if (r.width() >= showRect.width() && showRect.right() > r.right())
3863  x = showRect.left() - border;
3864  if (showRect.top() < r.top() && showRect.bottom() < r.bottom())
3865  y = showRect.top() - border;
3866  else if (showRect.top() > r.bottom())
3867  y = showRect.bottom() - height() / physicalZoomLevel() + border;
3868  else if (r.height() >= showRect.height() && showRect.bottom() > r.bottom())
3869  y = showRect.top() - border;
3870 
3871  // align to page borders if extends beyond
3872  Page* page = sys->page();
3873  if (x < page->x() || r.width() >= page->width())
3874  x = page->x();
3875  else if (r.width() < page->width() && r.width() + x > page->width() + page->x())
3876  x = (page->width() + page->x()) - r.width();
3877  if (y < page->y() || r.height() >= page->height())
3878  y = page->y();
3879  else if (r.height() < page->height() && r.height() + y > page->height() + page->y())
3880  y = (page->height() + page->y()) - r.height();
3881 
3882  // hack: don't update if we haven't changed the offset
3883  if (oldX == x && oldY == y)
3884  return;
3885 
3886  setOffset(-x * physicalZoomLevel(), -y * physicalZoomLevel());
3887  update();
3888  }

3908 void ScoreView::cmdEnterRest(const TDuration& d)

3914  else

3932 //---------------------------------------------------------
3933 // mscoreState
3934 //---------------------------------------------------------
3935 
3936 ScoreState ScoreView::mscoreState() const
3937  {
3938  if (fotoMode())
3939  return STATE_FOTO;
3940  if (state == ViewState::NOTE_ENTRY) {
3941  const InputState is = _score->inputState();
3942  Staff* staff = _score->staff(is.track() / VOICES);
3943 
3944  // pitched/unpitched depending on instrument (override StaffGroup)
3945  StaffGroup staffGroup = staff->staffType(is.tick())->group();
3946  if (staffGroup != StaffGroup::TAB)
3947  staffGroup = staff->part()->instrument(is.tick())->useDrumset() ? StaffGroup::PERCUSSION : StaffGroup::STANDARD;
3948  switch( staffGroup ) {
3949  case StaffGroup::STANDARD:
3950  return STATE_NOTE_ENTRY_STAFF_PITCHED;
3951  case StaffGroup::TAB:
3952  return STATE_NOTE_ENTRY_STAFF_TAB;
3953  case StaffGroup::PERCUSSION:
3954  return STATE_NOTE_ENTRY_STAFF_DRUM;
3955  }
3956  }
3957  if (state == ViewState::EDIT || state == ViewState::DRAG_EDIT) {
3958  if (editData.element && editData.element->isLyrics())
3959  return STATE_LYRICS_EDIT;
3960  else if (editData.element &&
3961  ( (editData.element->isHarmony()) || editData.element->isFiguredBass()) )
3962  return STATE_HARMONY_FIGBASS_EDIT;
3963  else if (editData.element && editData.element->isTextBase())
3964  return STATE_TEXT_EDIT;
3965  return STATE_EDIT;
3966  }
3967  if (state == ViewState::PLAY)
3968  return STATE_PLAY;
3969  return STATE_NORMAL;
3970  }

3976 void ScoreView::startUndoRedo(bool undo)

3982  if (_score->noteEntryMode() && !noteEntryMode())
3983  cmd("note-input"); // enter note entry mode
3984  else if (!_score->noteEntryMode() && noteEntryMode())
3985  cmd("escape"); // leave note entry mode
3986 
3987  updateEditElement();
3988  }

3990 //---------------------------------------------------------
3991 // cmdAddSlur
3992 // command invoked, or icon double clicked
3993 //---------------------------------------------------------
3994 
3995 void ScoreView::cmdAddSlur(const Slur* slurTemplate)
3996  {
3997  InputState& is = _score->inputState();
3998  if (noteEntryMode() && is.slur()) {
3999  const std::vector<SpannerSegment*>& el = is.slur()->spannerSegments();
4000  if (!el.empty()) {
4001  el.front()->setSelected(false);
4002  // Now make sure that the slur segment is redrawn so that it does not *look* selected
4003  update();
4004  }
4005  is.setSlur(nullptr);
4006  return;
4007  }
4008 
4009  _score->startCmd();
4010 
4011  ChordRest* cr1;
4012  ChordRest* cr2;
4013  const auto& sel = _score->selection();
4014  auto el = sel.uniqueElements();
4015 
4016  if (sel.isRange()) {
4017  int startTrack = sel.staffStart() * VOICES;
4018  int endTrack = sel.staffEnd() * VOICES;
4019  for (int track = startTrack; track < endTrack; ++track) {
4020  cr1 = 0;
4021  cr2 = 0;
4022  for (Element* e : el) {
4023  if (e->track() != track)
4024  continue;
4025  if (e->isNote())
4026  e = toNote(e)->chord();
4027  if (!e->isChord())
4028  continue;
4029  ChordRest* cr = toChordRest(e);
4030  if (!cr1 || cr1->tick() > cr->tick())
4031  cr1 = cr;
4032  if (!cr2 || cr2->tick() < cr->tick())
4033  cr2 = cr;
4034  }
4035  if (cr1 && (cr1 != cr2))
4036  addSlur(cr1, cr2, slurTemplate);
4037  }
4038  }
4039  else {
4040  cr1 = 0;
4041  cr2 = 0;
4042  for (Element* e : el) {
4043  if (e->isNote())
4044  e = toNote(e)->chord();
4045  if (!e->isChord())
4046  continue;
4047  ChordRest* cr = toChordRest(e);
4048  if (!cr1 || cr->isBefore(cr1))
4049  cr1 = cr;
4050  if (!cr2 || cr2->isBefore(cr))
4051  cr2 = cr;
4052  }
4053  if (cr1 == cr2)
4054  cr2 = 0;
4055  if (cr1)
4056  addSlur(cr1, cr2, slurTemplate);
4057  }
4058  _score->endCmd();
4059  }
4060 
4061 //---------------------------------------------------------
4062 // addSlur
4063 //---------------------------------------------------------
4064 
4065 void ScoreView::addSlur(ChordRest* cr1, ChordRest* cr2, const Slur* slurTemplate)
4066  {
4067  bool switchToSlur = false;
4068  if (cr2 == 0) {
4069  cr2 = nextChordRest(cr1);
4070  if (cr2 == 0)
4071  cr2 = cr1;
4072  switchToSlur = true; // select slur for editing if last chord is not given
4073  }
4074 
4075  Slur* slur = slurTemplate ? slurTemplate->clone() : new Slur(cr1->score());
4076  slur->setScore(cr1->score());
4077  slur->setTick(cr1->tick());
4078  slur->setTick2(cr2->tick());
4079  slur->setTrack(cr1->track());
4080  if (cr2->staff()->part() == cr1->staff()->part() && !cr2->staff()->isLinked(cr1->staff()))
4081  slur->setTrack2(cr2->track());
4082  else
4083  slur->setTrack2(cr1->track());
4084  slur->setStartElement(cr1);
4085  slur->setEndElement(cr2);
4086 
4087  cr1->score()->undoAddElement(slur);
4088  SlurSegment* ss = new SlurSegment(cr1->score());
4089  ss->setSpannerSegmentType(SpannerSegmentType::SINGLE);
4090  if (cr1 == cr2)
4091  ss->setSlurOffset(Grip::END, QPointF(3.0 * cr1->score()->spatium(), 0.0));
4092  slur->add(ss);
4093 
4094  if (noteEntryMode()) {
4095  _score->inputState().setSlur(slur);
4096  ss->setSelected(true);
4097  }
4098  else if (switchToSlur) {
4099  startEditMode(ss);
4100  }
4101  }

4103 //---------------------------------------------------------
4104 // cmdAddHairpin
4105 // '<' typed on keyboard
4106 //---------------------------------------------------------
4107 
4108 void ScoreView::cmdAddHairpin(HairpinType type)
4109  {
4110  const Selection& selection = _score->selection();
4111  // special case for two selected chordrests on same staff
4112  bool twoNotesSameStaff = false;
4113  if (selection.isList() && selection.elements().size() == 2) {
4114  ChordRest* cr1 = selection.firstChordRest();
4115  ChordRest* cr2 = selection.lastChordRest();
4116  if (cr1 && cr2 && cr1 != cr2 && cr1->staffIdx() == cr2->staffIdx())
4117  twoNotesSameStaff = true;
4118  }
4119  // add hairpin on each staff if possible
4120  if (selection.isRange() && selection.staffStart() != selection.staffEnd() - 1) {
4121  _score->startCmd();
4122  for (int staffIdx = selection.staffStart() ; staffIdx < selection.staffEnd(); ++staffIdx) {
4123  ChordRest* cr1 = selection.firstChordRest(staffIdx * VOICES);
4124  ChordRest* cr2 = selection.lastChordRest(staffIdx * VOICES);
4125  _score->addHairpin(type, cr1, cr2, /* toCr2End */ true);
4126  }
4127  _score->endCmd();
4128  }
4129  else if (selection.isRange() || selection.isSingle() || twoNotesSameStaff) {
4130  // for single staff range selection, or single selection,
4131  // find start & end elements elements
4132  ChordRest* cr1;
4133  ChordRest* cr2;
4134  _score->getSelectedChordRest2(&cr1, &cr2);
4135  _score->startCmd();
4136  Hairpin* pin = _score->addHairpin(type, cr1, cr2, /* toCr2End */ !twoNotesSameStaff);
4137  _score->endCmd();
4138  if (!pin)
4139  return;
4140 
4141  const std::vector<SpannerSegment*>& el = pin->spannerSegments();
4142  if (!noteEntryMode()) {
4143  if (!el.empty()) {
4144  startEditMode(el.front());
4145  }
4146  }
4147  }
4148  else {
4149  // do not attempt for list selection
4150  // or we will keep adding hairpins to the same chordrests
4151  return;
4152  }
4153  }

4155 //---------------------------------------------------------
4156 // cmdAddNoteLine
4157 //---------------------------------------------------------
4158 
4159 void ScoreView::cmdAddNoteLine()
4160  {
4161  Note* firstNote = 0;
4162  Note* lastNote = 0;
4163  if (_score->selection().isRange()) {
4164  int startTrack = _score->selection().staffStart() * VOICES;
4165  int endTrack = _score->selection().staffEnd() * VOICES;
4166  for (int track = startTrack; track < endTrack; ++track) {
4167  for (Note* n : _score->selection().noteList(track)) {
4168  if (firstNote == 0 || firstNote->chord()->tick() > n->chord()->tick())
4169  firstNote = n;
4170  if (lastNote == 0 || lastNote->chord()->tick() < n->chord()->tick())
4171  lastNote = n;
4172  }
4173  }
4174  }
4175  else {
4176  for (Note* n : _score->selection().noteList()) {
4177  if (firstNote == 0 || firstNote->chord()->tick() > n->chord()->tick())
4178  firstNote = n;
4179  if (lastNote == 0 || lastNote->chord()->tick() < n->chord()->tick())
4180  lastNote = n;
4181  }
4182  }
4183  if (!firstNote || !lastNote) {
4184  qDebug("addNoteLine: no note %p %p", firstNote, lastNote);
4185  return;
4186  }
4187  if (firstNote == lastNote) {
4188  qDebug("addNoteLine: no support for note to same note line %p", firstNote);
4189  return;
4190  }
4191  TextLine* tl = new TextLine(_score);
4192  tl->setParent(firstNote);
4193  tl->setStartElement(firstNote);
4194  tl->setEndElement(lastNote);
4195  tl->setDiagonal(true);
4196  tl->setAnchor(Spanner::Anchor::NOTE);
4197  tl->setTick(firstNote->chord()->tick());
4198  _score->startCmd();
4199  _score->undoAddElement(tl);
4200  _score->endCmd();
4201  }

4203 //---------------------------------------------------------
4204 // cmdChangeEnharmonic
4205 //---------------------------------------------------------
4206 
4207 void ScoreView::cmdChangeEnharmonic(bool both)
4208  {
4209  _score->startCmd();
4210  QList<Note*> notes = _score->selection().uniqueNotes();
4211  for (Note* n : notes) {
4212  Staff* staff = n->staff();
4213  if (staff->part()->instrument(n->tick())->useDrumset())
4214  continue;
4215  if (staff->isTabStaff(n->tick())) {
4216  int string = n->line() + (both ? 1 : -1);
4217  int fret = staff->part()->instrument(n->tick())->stringData()->fret(n->pitch(), string, staff, n->chord()->tick());
4218  if (fret != -1) {
4219  n->undoChangeProperty(Pid::FRET, fret);
4220  n->undoChangeProperty(Pid::STRING, string);
4221  }
4222  }
4223  else {
4224  static const int tab[36] = {
4225  26, 14, 2, // 60 B# C Dbb
4226  21, 21, 9, // 61 C# C# Db
4227  28, 16, 4, // 62 C## D Ebb
4228  23, 23, 11, // 63 D# D# Eb
4229  30, 18, 6, // 64 D## E Fb
4230  25, 13, 1, // 65 E# F Gbb
4231  20, 20, 8, // 66 F# F# Gb
4232  27, 15, 3, // 67 F## G Abb
4233  22, 22, 10, // 68 G# G# Ab
4234  29, 17, 5, // 69 G## A Bbb
4235  24, 24, 12, // 70 A# A# Bb
4236  31, 19, 7, // 71 A## B Cb
4237  };
4238  int tpc = n->tpc();
4239  int i;
4240  for (i = 0; i < 36; ++i) {
4241  if (tab[i] == tpc) {
4242  if ((i % 3) < 2) {
4243  if (tab[i] == tab[i + 1])
4244  tpc = tab[i + 2];
4245  else
4246  tpc = tab[i + 1];
4247  }
4248  else {
4249  tpc = tab[i - 2];
4250  }
4251  break;
4252  }
4253  }
4254  if (i == 36) {
4255  qDebug("tpc %d not found", tpc);
4256  }
4257  else {
4258  n->undoSetTpc(tpc);
4259  if (both || staff->part()->instrument(n->chord()->tick())->transpose().isZero()) {
4260  // change both spellings
4261  int t = n->transposeTpc(tpc);
4262  if (n->concertPitch())
4263  n->undoChangeProperty(Pid::TPC2, t);
4264  else
4265  n->undoChangeProperty(Pid::TPC1, t);
4266  }
4267  }
4268  }
4269  }
4270 
4271  Selection& selection = _score->selection();
4272  selection.clear();
4273  for (Note* n : notes)
4274  selection.add(n);
4275  _score->endCmd();
4276  }

4280 //---------------------------------------------------------

4282 void ScoreView::cloneElement(Element* e)
4283  {
4284  if (e->isMeasure() || e->isNote() || e->isVBox())
4285  return;
4286  QDrag* drag = new QDrag(this);
4287  QMimeData* mimeData = new QMimeData;
4288  if (e->isSpannerSegment())
4289  e = toSpannerSegment(e)->spanner();
4290  mimeData->setData(mimeSymbolFormat, e->mimeData(QPointF()));
4291  drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
4292  static QPixmap pixmap = QPixmap(2, 2); // null or 1x1 crashes on Linux under ChromeOS?!
4293  pixmap.fill(Qt::white);
4294  drag->setPixmap(pixmap);
4295  drag->exec(Qt::CopyAction);
4296  }

4329 //---------------------------------------------------------

4338 //---------------------------------------------------------
4339 // cmdTuplet
4340 //---------------------------------------------------------
4341 
4342 void ScoreView::cmdTuplet(int n, ChordRest* cr)
4343  {
4344  if (cr->durationType() < TDuration(TDuration::DurationType::V_512TH) && cr->durationType() != TDuration(TDuration::DurationType::V_MEASURE)) {
4345  mscore->noteTooShortForTupletDialog();
4346  return;
4347  }
4348  Measure* measure = cr->measure();
4349  if (measure && measure->isMMRest())
4350  return;
4351 
4352  Fraction f(cr->ticks());
4353  Tuplet* ot = cr->tuplet();
4354 
4355  f.reduce(); //measure duration might not be reduced
4356  Fraction ratio(n, f.numerator());
4357  Fraction fr(1, f.denominator());
4358  while (ratio.numerator() >= ratio.denominator() * 2) {
4359  ratio.setDenominator(ratio.denominator() * 2); // operator*= reduces, we don't want that here
4360  fr *= Fraction(1,2);
4361  }
4362 
4363  Tuplet* tuplet = new Tuplet(_score);
4364  tuplet->setRatio(ratio);
4365 
4366  //
4367  // "fr" is the fraction value of one tuple element
4368  //
4369  // "tuplet time" is "normal time" / tuplet->ratio()
4370  // Example: an 1/8 has 240 midi ticks, in an 1/8 triplet the note
4371  // has a tick duration of 240 / (3/2) = 160 ticks
4372  //
4373 
4374  tuplet->setTicks(f);
4375  TDuration baseLen(fr);
4376  tuplet->setBaseLen(baseLen);
4377 
4378  tuplet->setTrack(cr->track());
4379  tuplet->setTick(cr->tick());
4380  tuplet->setParent(measure);
4381 
4382  if (ot)
4383  tuplet->setTuplet(ot);
4384 
4385  cmdCreateTuplet(cr, tuplet);
4386  }
4387 
4388 //---------------------------------------------------------
4389 // cmdCreateTuplet
4390 //---------------------------------------------------------
4391 
4392 void ScoreView::cmdCreateTuplet(ChordRest* cr, Tuplet* tuplet)
4393  {
4394  _score->cmdCreateTuplet(cr, tuplet);
4395 
4396  const std::vector<DurationElement*>& cl = tuplet->elements();
4397  size_t ne = cl.size();
4398  DurationElement* el = 0;
4399  if (ne && cl[0]->type() == ElementType::REST)
4400  el = cl[0];
4401  else if (ne > 1)
4402  el = cl[1];
4403  if (el) {
4404  _score->select(el, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4405  _score->inputState().setDuration(tuplet->baseLen());
4406  changeState(ViewState::NOTE_ENTRY);
4407  }
4408  }

4410 //---------------------------------------------------------
4411 // changeVoice
4412 //---------------------------------------------------------
4413 
4414 void ScoreView::changeVoice(int voice)
4415  {
4416  InputState* is = &score()->inputState();
4417  int track = (is->track() / VOICES) * VOICES + voice;
4418 
4419  if (is->noteEntryMode()) {
4420  is->setTrack(track);
4421  if (is->segment()) { // can be null for eg repeatMeasure
4422  is->setSegment(is->segment()->measure()->first(SegmentType::ChordRest));
4423  moveCursor();
4424  score()->setUpdateAll();
4425  score()->update();
4426  mscore->setPos(is->segment()->tick());
4427  }
4428  }
4429  else {
4430  // treat as command to move notes to another voice
4431  score()->changeVoice(voice);
4432  // modify the input state only if the command was successful
4433  for (ChordRest* cr : score()->getSelectedChordRests())
4434  if (cr->voice() == voice) {
4435  is->setTrack(track);
4436  break;
4437  }
4438  }
4439  }

4441 //---------------------------------------------------------
4442 // cmdTuplet
4443 //---------------------------------------------------------
4444 
4445 void ScoreView::cmdTuplet(int n)
4446  {
4447  _score->startCmd();
4448  if (noteEntryMode()) {
4449  _score->expandVoice();
4450  ChordRest* cr = _score->inputState().cr();
4451  if (cr) {
4452  _score->changeCRlen(cr, _score->inputState().duration());
4453  cmdTuplet(n, cr);
4454  }
4455  }
4456  else {
4457  for (ChordRest* cr : _score->getSelectedChordRests()) {
4458  if (!cr->isGrace()) {
4459  cmdTuplet(n, cr);
4460  }
4461  }
4462  }
4463  _score->endCmd();
4464  moveCursor(); // do this after endCmd to make sure segment has been laid out
4465  }

4467 //---------------------------------------------------------
4468 // midiNoteReceived
4469 //---------------------------------------------------------
4470 
4471 void ScoreView::midiNoteReceived(int pitch, bool chord, int velocity)
4472  {
4473  qDebug("midiNoteReceived: pitch %d, chord %d, velocity %d", pitch, chord, velocity);
4474 
4475  MidiInputEvent ev;
4476  ev.pitch = pitch;
4477  ev.chord = chord;
4478  ev.velocity = velocity;
4479 
4480  score()->masterScore()->enqueueMidiEvent(ev);
4481 
4482  if (!score()->undoStack()->active())
4483  cmd((const char*)0);
4484 
4485  if (!chord && velocity && !realtimeTimer->isActive() && score()->usingNoteEntryMethod(NoteEntryMethod::REALTIME_AUTO)) {
4486  // First note pressed in automatic real-time mode.
4487  extendNoteTimer->start(preferences.getInt(PREF_IO_MIDI_REALTIMEDELAY)); // set timer to trigger repeatedly
4488  triggerCmdRealtimeAdvance(); // also trigger once immediately
4489  }
4490 
4491  }

4493 //---------------------------------------------------------
4494 // extendCurrentNote
4495 // Called after user has held down a midi key for a while.
4496 // TODO: adapt to allow calling from StepTime mode.
4497 //---------------------------------------------------------
4498 
4499 void ScoreView::extendCurrentNote()
4500  {
4501  if (!noteEntryMode() || realtimeTimer->isActive())
4502  return;
4503 
4504  allowRealtimeRests = false;
4505  realtimeTimer->start(preferences.getInt(PREF_IO_MIDI_REALTIMEDELAY)); // set timer to trigger repeatedly
4506  triggerCmdRealtimeAdvance(); // also trigger once immediately
4507  }

4509 //---------------------------------------------------------
4510 // realtimeAdvance
4511 //---------------------------------------------------------
4512 
4513 void ScoreView::realtimeAdvance(bool allowRests)
4514  {
4515  if (!noteEntryMode())
4516  return;
4517  InputState& is = score()->inputState();
4518  switch (is.noteEntryMethod()) {
4519  case NoteEntryMethod::REALTIME_MANUAL:
4520  allowRealtimeRests = allowRests;
4521  triggerCmdRealtimeAdvance();
4522  break;
4523  case NoteEntryMethod::REALTIME_AUTO:
4524  if (realtimeTimer->isActive())
4525  realtimeTimer->stop();
4526  else {
4527  allowRealtimeRests = allowRests;
4528  realtimeTimer->start(preferences.getInt(PREF_IO_MIDI_REALTIMEDELAY));
4529  }
4530  break;
4531  default:
4532  break;
4533  }
4534  }
4535 
4536 //---------------------------------------------------------
4537 // triggerCmdRealtimeAdvance
4538 //---------------------------------------------------------
4539 
4540 void ScoreView::triggerCmdRealtimeAdvance()
4541  {
4542  InputState& is = score()->inputState();
4543  bool realtime = is.usingNoteEntryMethod(NoteEntryMethod::REALTIME_AUTO) || is.usingNoteEntryMethod(NoteEntryMethod::REALTIME_MANUAL);
4544  if (!realtime || !noteEntryMode() || (!allowRealtimeRests && score()->activeMidiPitches()->empty())) {
4545  if (realtimeTimer->isActive())
4546  realtimeTimer->stop();
4547  allowRealtimeRests = true;
4548  return;
4549  }
4550  // give audible feedback immediately to indicate a beat, but dont advance just yet.
4551  seq->playMetronomeBeat(_score->tick2beatType(is.tick()));
4552  // The user will want to press notes "on the beat" and not before the beat, so wait a
4553  // little in case midi input event is received just after realtime-advance was called.
4554  QTimer::singleShot(100, Qt::PreciseTimer, this, SLOT(cmdRealtimeAdvance()));
4555  }
4556 
4557 //---------------------------------------------------------
4558 // cmdRealtimeAdvance
4559 // move input forwards and extend current chord/rest.
4560 //---------------------------------------------------------
4561 
4562 void ScoreView::cmdRealtimeAdvance()
4563  {
4564  InputState& is = _score->inputState();
4565  if (!is.noteEntryMode())
4566  return;
4567  _score->startCmd();
4568  Fraction ticks2measureEnd = is.segment()->measure()->ticks() - is.segment()->rtick();
4569  if (!is.cr() || (is.cr()->ticks() != is.duration().fraction() && is.duration() < ticks2measureEnd))
4570  _score->setNoteRest(is.segment(), is.track(), NoteVal(), is.duration().fraction(), Direction::AUTO);
4571  ChordRest* prevCR = toChordRest(is.cr());
4572  if (_score->inputState().endOfScore())
4573  _score->appendMeasures(1);
4574  is.moveToNextInputPos();
4575  if (_score->activeMidiPitches()->empty())
4576  _score->setNoteRest(is.segment(), is.track(), NoteVal(), is.duration().fraction(), Direction::AUTO);
4577  else {
4578  Chord* prevChord = prevCR->isChord() ? toChord(prevCR) : 0;
4579  bool partOfChord = false;
4580  for (const MidiInputEvent &ev : *_score->activeMidiPitches()) {
4581  _score->addTiedMidiPitch(ev.pitch, partOfChord, prevChord);
4582  partOfChord = true;
4583  }
4584  }
4585  if (prevCR->measure() != is.segment()->measure()) {
4586  // just advanced across barline. Now simplify tied notes.
4587  score()->regroupNotesAndRests(prevCR->measure()->tick(), is.segment()->measure()->tick(), is.track());
4588  }
4589  _score->endCmd();
4590  }
4591 
4592 //---------------------------------------------------------
4593 // cmdAddChordName
4594 //---------------------------------------------------------
4595 
4596 void ScoreView::cmdAddChordName(HarmonyType ht)
4597  {
4598  if (!_score->checkHasMeasures())
4599  return;
4600 
4601  int track = -1;
4602  Element* newParent = nullptr;
4603  Element* el = _score->selection().element();
4604  if (el && el->isFretDiagram()) {
4605  FretDiagram* fd = toFretDiagram(el);
4606  track = fd->track();
4607  newParent = fd;
4608  }
4609  else {
4610  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4611  if (cr) {
4612  track = cr->track();
4613  newParent = toElement(cr->segment());
4614  }
4615  }
4616  if (track == -1 || !newParent)
4617  return;
4618 
4619  _score->startCmd();
4620  Harmony* harmony = new Harmony(_score);
4621  harmony->setTrack(track);
4622  harmony->setParent(newParent);
4623  harmony->setHarmonyType(ht);
4624  _score->undoAddElement(harmony);
4625  _score->endCmd();
4626 
4627  _score->select(harmony, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4628  startEditMode(harmony);
4629  _score->update();
4630  }

4632 //---------------------------------------------------------
4633 // cmdAddText
4634 //---------------------------------------------------------
4635 
4636 void ScoreView::cmdAddText(Tid tid, Tid customTid, PropertyFlags pf, Placement p)
4637  {
4638  if (!_score->checkHasMeasures())
4639  return;
4640  if (noteEntryMode()) // force out of entry mode
4641  changeState(ViewState::NORMAL);
4642 
4643  TextBase* s = 0;
4644  _score->startCmd();
4645  if (tid == Tid::STAFF && customTid == Tid::EXPRESSION)
4646  tid = customTid; // expression is not first class element, but treat as such
4647  switch (tid) {
4648  case Tid::TITLE:
4649  case Tid::SUBTITLE:
4650  case Tid::COMPOSER:
4651  case Tid::POET:
4652  case Tid::INSTRUMENT_EXCERPT:
4653  {
4654  MeasureBase* measure = _score->first();
4655  if (!measure->isVBox()) {
4656  _score->insertMeasure(ElementType::VBOX, measure);
4657  measure = measure->prev();
4658  }
4659  s = new Text(_score, tid);
4660  s->setParent(measure);
4661  _score->undoAddElement(s);
4662  }
4663  break;
4664 
4665  case Tid::REHEARSAL_MARK:
4666  {
4667  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4668  if (!cr)
4669  break;
4670  s = new RehearsalMark(_score);
4671  cr->undoAddAnnotation(s);
4672  }
4673  break;
4674  case Tid::STAFF:
4675  {
4676  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4677  if (!cr)
4678  break;
4679  s = new StaffText(_score, Tid::STAFF);
4680  // if the previous text is UNSTYLED or NOSTYLE
4681  // and the next text is created using text tab command
4682  // (only those created in this way can make pf not STYLED, see definition of ScoreView::textTab())
4683  // it inherits the same PropertyFlags and Placement
4684  // making it much easier to put all texts above/below staves
4685  if (pf != PropertyFlags::STYLED) {
4686  s->setPlacement(p);
4687  s->setPropertyFlags(Pid::PLACEMENT, pf);
4688  }
4689  cr->undoAddAnnotation(s);
4690  }
4691  break;
4692  case Tid::SYSTEM:
4693  {
4694  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4695  if (!cr)
4696  break;
4697  s = new SystemText(_score, Tid::SYSTEM);
4698  if (pf != PropertyFlags::STYLED) {
4699  s->setPlacement(p);
4700  s->setPropertyFlags(Pid::PLACEMENT, pf);
4701  }
4702  cr->undoAddAnnotation(s);
4703  }
4704  break;
4705  case Tid::EXPRESSION:
4706  {
4707  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4708  if (!cr)
4709  break;
4710  s = new StaffText(_score, Tid::EXPRESSION);
4711  s->setPlacement(Placement::BELOW);
4712  s->setPropertyFlags(Pid::PLACEMENT, PropertyFlags::UNSTYLED);
4713  cr->undoAddAnnotation(s);
4714  }
4715  break;
4716  case Tid::INSTRUMENT_CHANGE:
4717  {
4718  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4719  if (!cr)
4720  break;
4721  s = new InstrumentChange(_score);
4722  cr->undoAddAnnotation(s);
4723  }
4724  break;
4725  case Tid::STICKING:
4726  {
4727  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4728  if (!cr)
4729  break;
4730  s = new Sticking(_score);
4731  cr->undoAddAnnotation(s);
4732  }
4733  break;
4734  case Tid::FINGERING:
4735  case Tid::LH_GUITAR_FINGERING:
4736  case Tid::RH_GUITAR_FINGERING:
4737  case Tid::STRING_NUMBER:
4738  {
4739  Element* e = _score->getSelectedElement();
4740  if (!e || !e->isNote())
4741  break;
4742  bool isTablature = e->staff()->isTabStaff(e->tick());
4743  bool tabFingering = e->staff()->staffType(e->tick())->showTabFingering();
4744  if (isTablature && !tabFingering)
4745  break;
4746  s = new Fingering(_score, tid);
4747  s->setTrack(e->track());
4748  s->setParent(e);
4749  if (pf != PropertyFlags::STYLED) {
4750  s->setPlacement(p);
4751  s->setPropertyFlags(Pid::PLACEMENT, pf);
4752  }
4753  _score->undoAddElement(s);
4754  }
4755  break;
4756  default:
4757  break;
4758  }
4759 
4760  if (s) {
4761  if (customTid != Tid::DEFAULT && customTid != tid)
4762  s->initTid(customTid);
4763  _score->select(s, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4764  _score->endCmd();
4765  Measure* m = s->findMeasure();
4766  if (m && m->hasMMRest() && s->links()) {
4767  Measure* mmRest = m->mmRest();
4768  for (ScoreElement* se : *s->links()) {
4769  TextBase* s1 = toTextBase(se);
4770  if (s != s1 && s1->findMeasure() == mmRest) {
4771  s = s1;
4772  break;
4773  }
4774  }
4775  }
4776  adjustCanvasPosition(s, false);
4777  startEditMode(s);
4778  }
4779  else
4780  _score->endCmd();
4781  }
4782

4833 void ScoreView::cmdInsertMeasures(int n, ElementType type)
4834  {
4835  MeasureBase* mb = checkSelectionStateForInsertMeasure();
4836  if (!mb)
4837  return;
4838  _score->startCmd();
4839  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
4840  _score->insertMeasure(type, mb);
4841  _score->endCmd();

4843  if (mb->type() == ElementType::MEASURE) {
4844  // re-select the original measure (which may now be covered by an mmrest)
4845  // do this after the layout so mmrests are updated
4846  Measure* m = _score->tick2measureMM(mb->tick());
4847  _score->select(m, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4848  }
4849  else {
4850  // original selection was not a measure, just re-select it
4851  _score->select(mb, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4852  }
4853  }

4855 //---------------------------------------------------------
4856 // cmdInsertMeasure
4857 //---------------------------------------------------------
4858 
4859 void ScoreView::cmdInsertMeasure(ElementType type)
4860  {
4861  MeasureBase* mb = checkSelectionStateForInsertMeasure();
4862  if (!mb)
4863  return;
4864  _score->startCmd();
4865  _score->insertMeasure(type, mb);
4866  mb = mb->prev();
4867  if (mb->type() == ElementType::TBOX) {
4868  TBox* tbox = static_cast<TBox*>(mb);
4869  Text* s = tbox->text();
4870  _score->select(s, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4871  _score->endCmd();
4872  startEditMode(s);
4873  return;
4874  }
4875  if (mb)
4876  _score->select(mb, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
4877  _score->endCmd();
4878  }

4880 //---------------------------------------------------------
4881 // checkSelectionStateForInsertMeasure
4882 //---------------------------------------------------------
4883 
4884 MeasureBase* ScoreView::checkSelectionStateForInsertMeasure()
4885  {
4886  MeasureBase* mb = 0;
4887  if (_score->selection().isRange()) {
4888  mb = _score->selection().startSegment()->measure();
4889  return mb;
4890  }
4891 
4892  mb = _score->selection().findMeasure();
4893  if (mb)
4894  return mb;
4895 
4896  Element* e = _score->selection().element();
4897  if (e) {
4898  if (e->type() == ElementType::VBOX || e->type() == ElementType::TBOX || e->type() == ElementType::HBOX)
4899  return static_cast<MeasureBase*>(e);
4900  }
4901  QMessageBox::warning(0, "MuseScore",
4902  tr("No measure selected:\n" "Please select a measure and try again"));
4903  return 0;
4904  }

4906 //---------------------------------------------------------
4907 // cmdRepeatSelection
4908 //---------------------------------------------------------
4909 
4910 void ScoreView::cmdRepeatSelection()
4911  {
4912  const Selection& selection = _score->selection();
4913 
4914  if (noteEntryMode() && selection.isSingle()) {
4915  Element* el = _score->selection().element();
4916  if (el && el->type() == ElementType::NOTE) {
4917  if (!_score->inputState().endOfScore()) {
4918  _score->startCmd();
4919  bool addTo = false;
4920  Chord* c = static_cast<Note*>(el)->chord();
4921  for (Note* note : c->notes()) {
4922  NoteVal nval = note->noteVal();
4923  _score->addPitch(nval, addTo);
4924  addTo = true;
4925  }
4926  _score->endCmd();
4927  }
4928  }
4929  return;
4930  }
4931  if (!selection.isRange()) {
4932  ChordRest* cr = _score->getSelectedChordRest();
4933  if (!cr)
4934  return;
4935  _score->select(cr, SelectType::RANGE);
4936  }
4937 
4938  if (!checkCopyOrCut())
4939  return;
4940 
4941  QString mimeType = selection.mimeType();
4942  if (mimeType.isEmpty()) {
4943  qDebug("mime type is empty");
4944  return;
4945  }
4946  QMimeData* mimeData = new QMimeData;
4947  mimeData->setData(mimeType, selection.mimeData());
4948  if (MScore::debugMode)
4949  qDebug("cmdRepeatSelection: <%s>", mimeData->data(mimeType).data());
4950  QApplication::clipboard()->setMimeData(mimeData);
4951 
4952  QByteArray d(mimeData->data(mimeType));
4953  XmlReader xml(d);
4954  xml.setPasteMode(true);
4955 
4956  int dStaff = selection.staffStart();
4957  Segment* endSegment = selection.endSegment();
4958 
4959  if (endSegment && endSegment->segmentType() != SegmentType::ChordRest)
4960  endSegment = endSegment->next1(SegmentType::ChordRest);
4961  if (endSegment && endSegment->element(dStaff * VOICES)) {
4962  Element* e = endSegment->element(dStaff * VOICES);
4963  if (e) {
4964  ChordRest* cr = toChordRest(e);
4965  _score->startCmd();
4966  _score->pasteStaff(xml, cr->segment(), cr->staffIdx());
4967  _score->endCmd();
4968  }
4969  else
4970  qDebug("ScoreView::cmdRepeatSelection: cannot paste: %p <%s>", e, e ? e->name() : "");
4971  }
4972  else {
4973  qDebug("cmdRepeatSelection: cannot paste: endSegment: %p dStaff %d", endSegment, dStaff);
4974  }
4975  }

4977 //---------------------------------------------------------
4978 // searchPage
4979 //---------------------------------------------------------
4980 
4981 bool ScoreView::searchPage(int n)
4982  {
4983  bool result = true;
4984  n -= score()->pageNumberOffset();
4985  if (n <= 0) {
4986  n = 1;
4987  result = false;
4988  }
4989  n--;
4990  if (n >= _score->npages()) {
4991  result = false;
4992  n = _score->npages() - 1;
4993  }
4994  const Page* page = _score->pages()[n];
4995  foreach (System* s, page->systems()) {
4996  if (s->firstMeasure()) {
4997  gotoMeasure(s->firstMeasure());
4998  break;
4999  }
5000  }
5001  return result;
5002  }
5003 
5004 //---------------------------------------------------------
5005 // searchMeasure
5006 //---------------------------------------------------------
5007 
5008 bool ScoreView::searchMeasure(int n)
5009  {
5010  if (n <= 0)
5011  return false;
5012  bool result = true;
5013  --n;
5014  int i = 0;
5015  Measure* measure;
5016  for (measure = _score->firstMeasureMM(); measure; measure = measure->nextMeasureMM()) {
5017  int nn = _score->styleB(Sid::createMultiMeasureRests) && measure->isMMRest()
5018  ? measure->mmRestCount() : 1;
5019  if (n >= i && n < (i+nn))
5020  break;
5021  i += nn;
5022  }
5023  if (!measure) {
5024  measure = score()->lastMeasureMM();
5025  result = false;
5026  }
5027  gotoMeasure(measure);
5028  return result;
5029  }

5031 //---------------------------------------------------------
5032 // searchRehearsalMark
5033 //---------------------------------------------------------
5034 
5035 bool ScoreView::searchRehearsalMark(const QString& s)
5036  {
5037  //search rehearsal marks
5038  QString ss = s.toLower();
5039  bool found = false;
5040  for (Segment* seg = score()->firstSegment(SegmentType::ChordRest); seg; seg = seg->next1(SegmentType::ChordRest)) {
5041  for (Element* e : seg->annotations()){
5042  if (e->type() == ElementType::REHEARSAL_MARK) {
5043  RehearsalMark* rm = static_cast<RehearsalMark*>(e);
5044  QString rms = rm->plainText().toLower();
5045  if (rms.startsWith(ss)) {
5046  gotoMeasure(seg->measure());
5047  found = true;
5048  break;
5049  }
5050  }
5051  }
5052  if (found)
5053  break;
5054  }
5055  return found;
5056  }

5058 //---------------------------------------------------------
5059 // gotoMeasure
5060 //---------------------------------------------------------
5061 
5062 void ScoreView::gotoMeasure(Measure* measure)
5063  {
5064  adjustCanvasPosition(measure, state != ViewState::NORMAL);
5065  int tracks = _score->nstaves() * VOICES;
5066  for (Segment* segment = measure->first(); segment; segment = segment->next()) {
5067  if (segment->segmentType() != SegmentType::ChordRest)
5068  continue;
5069  int track;
5070  for (track = 0; track < tracks; ++track) {
5071  ChordRest* cr = static_cast<ChordRest*>(segment->element(track));
5072  if (cr) {
5073  Element* e;
5074  if (cr->type() == ElementType::CHORD)
5075  e = static_cast<Chord*>(cr)->upNote();
5076  else //REST
5077  e = cr;
5078 
5079  _score->select(e, SelectType::SINGLE, 0);
5080  break;
5081  }
5082  }
5083  if (track != tracks)
5084  break;
5085  }
5086  _score->setUpdateAll();
5087  _score->update();
5088  }

5102  _curLoopOut->move(_score->pos(POS::RIGHT));

5105 //---------------------------------------------------------
5106 // elementLower
5107 //---------------------------------------------------------
5108 
5109 static bool elementLower(const Element* e1, const Element* e2)
5110  {
5111  if (!e1->selectable())
5112  return false;
5113  if (!e2->selectable())
5114  return true;
5115  if (e1->isNote() && e2->isStem())
5116  return true;
5117  if (e2->isNote() && e1->isStem())
5118  return false;
5119  if (e1->z() == e2->z()) {
5120  // same stacking order, prefer non-hidden elements
5121  if (e1->type() == e2->type()) {
5122  if (e1->type() == ElementType::NOTEDOT) {
5123  const NoteDot* n1 = static_cast<const NoteDot*>(e1);
5124  const NoteDot* n2 = static_cast<const NoteDot*>(e2);
5125  if (n1->note() && n1->note()->hidden())
5126  return false;
5127  else if (n2->note() && n2->note()->hidden())
5128  return true;
5129  }
5130  else if (e1->type() == ElementType::NOTE) {
5131  const Note* n1 = static_cast<const Note*>(e1);
5132  const Note* n2 = static_cast<const Note*>(e2);
5133  if (n1->hidden())
5134  return false;
5135  else if (n2->hidden())
5136  return true;
5137  }
5138  }
5139  // different types, or same type but nothing hidden - use track
5140  return e1->track() <= e2->track();
5141  }
5142 
5143  // default case, use stacking order
5144  return e1->z() <= e2->z();
5145  }
5146 
5147 //---------------------------------------------------------
5148 // elementsNear
5149 //---------------------------------------------------------
5150 
5151 QList<Element*> ScoreView::elementsNear(QPointF p)
5152  {
5153  QList<Element*> ll;
5154  Page* page = point2page(p);
5155  if (!page)
5156  return ll;
5157 
5158  p -= page->pos();
5159  double w = (preferences.getInt(PREF_UI_CANVAS_MISC_SELECTIONPROXIMITY) * .5) / matrix().m11();
5160  QRectF r(p.x() - w, p.y() - w, 3.0 * w, 3.0 * w);
5161 
5162  QList<Element*> el = page->items(r);
5163  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_HEADERS; i++)
5164  if (score()->headerText(i) != nullptr) // gives the ability to select the header
5165  el.push_back(score()->headerText(i));
5166  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_FOOTERS; i++)
5167  if (score()->footerText(i) != nullptr) // gives the ability to select the footer
5168  el.push_back(score()->footerText(i));
5169  for (Element* e : el) {
5170  e->itemDiscovered = 0;
5171  if (!e->selectable() || e->isPage())
5172  continue;
5173  if (e->contains(p))
5174  ll.append(e);
5175  }
5176  int n = ll.size();
5177  if ((n == 0) || ((n == 1) && (ll[0]->isMeasure()))) {
5178  //
5179  // if no relevant element hit, look nearby
5180  //
5181  for (Element* e : el) {
5182  if (e->isPage() || !e->selectable())
5183  continue;
5184  if (e->intersects(r))
5185  ll.append(e);
5186  }
5187  }
5188  if (!ll.empty())
5189  std::sort(ll.begin(), ll.end(), elementLower);
5190  return ll;
5191  }
5192 
5193 //---------------------------------------------------------
5194 // elementNear
5195 //---------------------------------------------------------
5196 
5197 Element* ScoreView::elementNear(QPointF p)
5198  {
5199  QList<Element*> ll = elementsNear(p);
5200  if (ll.empty()) {
5201  // qDebug(" nothing found");
5202  return 0;
5203  }
5204 #if 0
5205  qDebug("==");
5206  for (const Element* e : ll)
5207  qDebug(" %s selected %d z %d", e->name(), e->selected(), e->z());
5208 #endif
5209  Element* e = ll.at(0);
5210  return e;
5211  }

5255 //---------------------------------------------------------
5256 // cmdMoveCR
5257 // swap selected cr with cr to the left or right
5258 // - not across measure boundaries
5259 //---------------------------------------------------------
5260 
5261 void ScoreView::cmdMoveCR(bool left)
5262  {
5263  Element* e = _score->getSelectedElement();
5264  if (e && (e->type() == ElementType::NOTE || e->type() == ElementType::REST)) {
5265  if (e->type() == ElementType::NOTE)
5266  e = e->parent();
5267  QList<ChordRest*> crl;
5268  if (e->links()) {
5269  for (ScoreElement* cr : *e->links())
5270  crl.append(static_cast<ChordRest*>(cr));
5271  }
5272  else
5273  crl.append(static_cast<ChordRest*>(e));
5274 
5275  bool cmdActive = false;
5276  for (ChordRest* cr1 : crl) {
5277  if (cr1->type() == ElementType::REST) {
5278  Rest* r = static_cast<Rest*>(cr1);
5279  if (r->measure() && r->measure()->isMMRest())
5280  break;
5281  }
5282  ChordRest* cr2 = left ? prevChordRest(cr1) : nextChordRest(cr1);
5283  // ensures cr1 is the left chord, useful in SwapCR::flip()
5284  if (left)
5285  std::swap(cr1, cr2);
5286  if (cr1 && cr2 && cr1->measure() == cr2->measure() && !cr1->tuplet() && !cr2->tuplet()
5287  && cr1->durationType() == cr2->durationType() && cr1->ticks() == cr2->ticks()
5288  // if two chords belong to different two-note tremolos, abort
5289  && !(cr1->isChord() && toChord(cr1)->tremolo() && toChord(cr1)->tremolo()->twoNotes()
5290  && cr2->isChord() && toChord(cr2)->tremolo() && toChord(cr2)->tremolo()->twoNotes()
5291  && toChord(cr1)->tremolo() != toChord(cr2)->tremolo())) {
5292  if (!cmdActive) {
5293  _score->startCmd();
5294  cmdActive = true;
5295  }
5296  _score->undo(new SwapCR(cr1, cr2));
5297  }
5298  }
5299  if (cmdActive)
5300  _score->endCmd();
5301  }
5302  }

5321  return;

5324

5326

5328  _score->deselectAll();

5480 //---------------------------------------------------------
5481 // visibleElementInScore
5482 //---------------------------------------------------------
5483 
5484 static const Element* visibleElementInScore(const Element* orig, const Score* s)
5485  {
5486  if (!orig)
5487  return nullptr;
5488  if (orig->score() == s && orig->bbox().isValid())
5489  return orig;
5490 
5491  for (const ScoreElement* se : orig->linkList()) {
5492  const Element* e = toElement(se);
5493  if (e->score() == s && e->bbox().isValid()) // bbox check to ensure the element is indeed visible
5494  return e;
5495  }
5496 
5497  return nullptr;
5498  }

5500 //---------------------------------------------------------
5501 // needViewportMove
5502 //---------------------------------------------------------
5503 
5504 static bool needViewportMove(Score* cs, ScoreView* cv)
5505  {
5506  if (!cs || !cv)
5507  return false;
5508 
5509  const CmdState& state = cs->cmdState();
5510 
5511  if (state.startTick() < Fraction(0, 1))
5512  return false;
5513 
5514  const QRectF viewport = cv->canvasViewport(); // TODO: margins for intersection check?
5515 
5516  const Element* editElement = visibleElementInScore(state.element(), cs);
5517  if (editElement && editElement->bbox().isValid() && !editElement->isSpanner())
5518  return !viewport.intersects(editElement->canvasBoundingRect());
5519 
5520  if (state.startTick().isZero() && state.endTick() == cs->endTick())
5521  return false; // TODO: adjust staff perhaps?
5522 
5523  // Is any part of the range visible?
5524  Measure* mStart = cs->tick2measureMM(state.startTick());
5525  Measure* mEnd = cs->tick2measureMM(state.endTick());
5526  mEnd = mEnd ? mEnd->nextMeasureMM() : nullptr;
5527 
5528  const bool isExcerpt = !cs->isMaster();
5529  const bool csStaves = (isExcerpt || (state.endStaff() < 0) || (state.endStaff() >= cs->nstaves()));
5530  const int startStaff = csStaves ? 0 : state.startStaff();
5531  const int endStaff = csStaves ? (cs->nstaves() - 1) : state.endStaff();
5532 
5533  for (Measure* m = mStart; m && m != mEnd; m = m->nextMeasureMM()) {
5534  for (int st = startStaff; st <= endStaff; ++st) {
5535  const StaffLines* l = m->staffLines(st);
5536  if (l) {
5537  const QRectF r = l->bbox().translated(l->canvasPos());
5538  if (viewport.intersects(r))
5539  return false;
5540  }
5541  }
5542  }
5543 
5544  // maybe viewport is at least near the desired position?
5545  const QPointF p = viewport.center();
5546  int staffIdx = 0;
5547  const Measure* m = cs->pos2measure(p, &staffIdx, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
5548  if (m && m->tick() >= state.startTick() && m->tick() <= state.endTick())
5549  return false;
5550 
5551  return true;
5552  }
5553 
5554 //---------------------------------------------------------
5555 // moveViewportToLastEdit
5556 //---------------------------------------------------------
5557 
5558 void ScoreView::moveViewportToLastEdit()
5559  {
5560  if (_blockShowEdit)
5561  return;
5562 
5563  Score* sc = score();
5564 
5565  if (!needViewportMove(sc, this))
5566  return;
5567 
5568  const CmdState& st = sc->cmdState();
5569  const Element* editElement = visibleElementInScore(st.element(), sc);
5570 
5571  const MeasureBase* mb = nullptr;
5572  if (editElement) {
5573  if (editElement->isSpannerSegment()) {
5574  const SpannerSegment* s = toSpannerSegment(editElement);
5575  Fraction tick = s->tick();
5576  if (System* sys = s->system()) {
5577  Measure* fm = sys->firstMeasure();
5578  if (fm)
5579  tick = std::max(tick, fm->tick());
5580  }
5581  mb = sc->tick2measureMM(tick);
5582  }
5583  else {
5584  mb = editElement->findMeasureBase();
5585  }
5586  }
5587  if (!mb)
5588  mb = sc->tick2measureMM(st.startTick());
5589  if (!mb)
5590  return;
5591 
5592  const Element* viewportElement = (editElement && editElement->bbox().isValid() && !mb->isMeasure()) ? editElement : mb;
5593 
5594  const int staff = sc->isMaster() && mb->isMeasure() ? st.startStaff() : -1; // TODO: choose the closest staff to the current viewport?
5595  adjustCanvasPosition(viewportElement, /* playback */ false, staff);
5596  }
